name: openkeynav
description: OpenKeyNav: A JavaScript plugin for enhancing keyboard navigation and accessibility on web pages.

scripts.build: babel src -d dist && rollup -c && terser dist/OpenKeyNav.js -o dist/openkeynav.min.js && terser dist/openkeynav.umd.js -o dist/openkeynav.umd.min.js
scripts.patch_build_commit: npm run update-version-js && npm run build && git add --all; git commit -m "patch build and commit"
scripts.patch_build_pack: npm run update-version-js && npm run build && npm pack

author: Lawrence Weru
